content:
Using the 10 items that you provided in last response, Add an example for each task. This should the format:
 #5 [Lead Nurturing Strategy]
Task: Develop a lead nurturing strategy to move leads through the funnel. 

For example, we will invite people to a local event after they have signed up for an ebook and provided their location in the lead capture form on our website. 

KPIs: Engagement rates for nurturing campaigns, number of leads progressing through the funnel, event attendance rates
Benefits: Increased lead engagement and conversion rates, improved lead retention and loyalty, increased investment in the company
